column4: I'm trying to install a public key for a user to login to my server. It has BEGIN SSH2 PUBLIC KEY and I'm not sure if this goes in .ssh/authorized_keys or .ssh2/authorization
.ssh/authorized_keys, at least thats how mine is setup.
thx, should I reformat it so it's all on one line? The key I generated doesn't look anything like that
Its up to you, it might work. I think whitespace is ignored but returns might trip it up.
